messages.user: What is the grammatical structure of this sentence? please answer in English
messages.ai: {'answer': "The grammatical structure is: Subject ('One of the most significant advantages of internet-based language learning') + Linking Verb ('is') + Subject Complement ('the availability of authentic materials'). It's a simple sentence with a subject-verb-complement pattern."}
